data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Chi-Feng, Matsumura, Yoko (2013): On newly and recently recorded species of the genus Lema Fabricius (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Criocerinae) from Taiwan. ZooKeys 262: 17-38, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.262.4152, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.262.4152
